Package com.exolve.voicesdk

Interface ICallsListener

public interface ICallsListener
The call's lifecycle interface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    callConnected(Call call)
    The call has been accepted and voice media exchange has been established
    void
    callConnectionLost(Call call)
    The call has been interrupted due to loss of network connectivity
    void
    callDisconnected(Call call)
    The call has been finished and it's going to be deleted
    void
    callError(Call call, CallError error, String message)
    The call has been finished with an error and it's going to be deleted
    void
    callHold(Call call)
    The call has been placed on hold
    void
    callInConference(Call call, boolean inConference)
    The call has been added to or removed from the local conference
    void
    callMuted(Call call)
    The call's mute state has changed (mute call state can be got from the call instance)
    void
    callNew(Call call)
    A new outgoing or incoming call has been created
    void
    callResumed(Call call)
    The call has been resumed (previously the call was on hold)
    void
    callUserActionRequired(Call call, CallPendingEvent pendingEvent, CallUserAction action)
    Need user action to continue the existing call for call accepting (the call is incoming) for call resuming (the call is on hold)

  • Method Details

    • callNew

      void callNew(Call call)
      A new outgoing or incoming call has been created
      Parameters:
      call - the instance of a new call

    • callConnected

      void callConnected(Call call)
      The call has been accepted and voice media exchange has been established
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callHold

      void callHold(Call call)
      The call has been placed on hold
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callResumed

      void callResumed(Call call)
      The call has been resumed (previously the call was on hold)
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callDisconnected

      void callDisconnected(Call call)
      The call has been finished and it's going to be deleted
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callError

      void callError(Call call, CallError error, String message)
      The call has been finished with an error and it's going to be deleted
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance
      error - the error
      message - the message for the error

    • callConnectionLost

      void callConnectionLost(Call call)
      The call has been interrupted due to loss of network connectivity
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callInConference

      void callInConference(Call call, boolean inConference)
      The call has been added to or removed from the local conference
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance
      inConference - the flag which shows the call's presence in local conference

    • callMuted

      void callMuted(Call call)
      The call's mute state has changed (mute call state can be got from the call instance)
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance

    • callUserActionRequired

      void callUserActionRequired(Call call, CallPendingEvent pendingEvent, CallUserAction action)
      Need user action to continue the existing call for call accepting (the call is incoming) for call resuming (the call is on hold)
      Parameters:
      call - the call instance
      pendingEvent - pending event which needs this action to continue the call
      action - the required call user action
